alert.note: Alert for Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 4:21PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Hennepin County through 445 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Minnetonka, or 9 miles southwest of Minneapolis, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hopkins around 430 PM CDT. Wayzata around 435 PM CDT. Minnetonka and St. Louis Park around 440 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Minneapolis, Plymouth, Brooklyn Center and Golden Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
